column4: - Ubuntu uses iptables and is configured by default to pretty stealthy. see gibson research shields up! test - firestarter is a linux gui firewall that is really only necessary if you need to easily configure settings not already setup.
thoreauputic : I never was prompted to set up a su passwd and I am unable to su, any ideas?
- google amaranth's "smeg"simple menu editor for gnome.
